description: Nikki Darling runs a "fantasy fulfillment service" for woman to pre-arrange steamy gang bangs for themselves. She is a tough boss, constantly slinging abuse at the nerds who work in the office. When Tommy Pistol overhears her confiding to a client that she actually wants a gang bang of her own, he decides the timing is right for the nerds to unite and take revenge! She says they are pathetic and dares them to give her the pounding of her dreams. The boys pull through with rough sex, double Vag and extreme throat fucking, Bukkake.
title: Office nerds unite! Bitchy boss gets what's coming to her.
